synopsis: A job monger, Shiva who ends up as a taxiwala only to realise his ride is a beyond what anyone can expect.

synopsis: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize that the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats that lurk beyond the sand path.

titre: The Personal History of David Copperfield
synopsis: A fresh and distinctive take on Charles Dickens’ semi-autobiographical masterpiece, The Personal History of David Copperfield, set in the 1840s, chronicles the life of its iconic title character as he navigates a chaotic world to find his elusive place within it. From his unhappy childhood to the discovery of his gift as a storyteller and writer, David’s journey is by turns hilarious and tragic, but always full of life, colour and humanity.
tagline: From rags to riches... and back again.
casting: ['Dev Patel', 'Peter Capaldi', 'Ben Whishaw', 'Tilda Swinton', 'Gwendoline Christie', 'Hugh Laurie', 'Anthony Welsh', 'Aneurin Barnard', 'Divian Ladwa', 'Rosalind Eleazar', 'Morfydd Clark', 'Benedict Wong', 'Paul Whitehouse', 'Daisy May Cooper', 'Daniel Fearn', 'Sophie McShera', 'Nikki Amuka-Bird', 'Bronagh Gallagher', 'Ruby Bentall', 'Darren Boyd', 'Anna Maxwell Martin', 'Matthew Cottle', 'Peter Singh', 'Lynn Hunter', 'Jairaj Varsani', 'Ranveer Jaiswal', 'Rosaleen Linehan', 'Victor McGuire', 'Phaldut Sharma', 'Tuwaine Barrett', 'Aimee Kelly', 'Albie Atkinson', 'Faisal Dacosta', 'Fisayo Akinade', 'Glen Davies', 'Nigel Betts']
